name: Pack-Man (Invincible.707)
description:
Use the WASD keys to move. Grab(left click) and sort boxes into categories by color and size. Press the number on the sorting box to sort. For example if there is a big red box, you grab it, and you move to the side of the room that has the appropriate categories. When you are close enough to the sorting box, press the number on the box, and you will receive a point in the top right corner! The goal is to sort as many boxes as possible in 90 seconds!  

This is our first game jam and it's pretty buggy, so please don't exploit!

Made for the Quarantine Jam.

Thanks, 

Juju and Krakker
